product_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block:
I | PAINTS CONTROL LAB
I2 | AUTOMATIC SPRINKLER SYSTEM
product_entries.full_product_description:
Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be grooved with groove coupling. All related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope.
e | 40 mm NB
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ms(mild steel), grade: heavy, thickness: 5.4mm, standard: indian standard 1239 Part -1, fittings: elbows, tees, flanges, reduces clamps, ms support dash fasteners, painting: two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint, joint type: grooved with groove coupling, scope: all related civil work, supports etc of vendor's scope
